title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 364-1.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 364-1.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

It is the purpose of this Part to protect the environment
from mishandling and mismanagement of all regulated wastes transported from the
site of generation to the site of ultimate treatment, storage or disposal and
to prevent a discharge of wastes into the environment, whether accidental or
intentional, except at a site approved for the treatment, storage or disposal
of the wastes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
364-1.1

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
